title: Nanashi no Satsujinki wa Isekai de Kyou mou Warau - Novel Updates
author: Mr.初雪
description: There’s no name for me. There’s a time that I only had my sniper rifle, survival knife, and handgun. It’s seems I killed too much and god is very angry at me. I’m half forcibly killed and sent into another world. But I don’t have any plan to overstaying in this world. Who ever you are, what do you want to use, I must come back to my former world.>
